reviewText: I really like the step by step and review instruction.

Great support product for those taking a live class.  And enough step by step , clear instructions for those who cannot get to a live class.  There is also a huge international community of instructors to help answer questions from folks who are only working with the DVD.  I have enjoyed so many health benefits from doing this program!
I have used this video very little.  I found that being in a class 'in person' works much better.
